1. ‘This Act may be cited as the Code of Intellectual Pro- Short title. perty (Amendment) Act, No, 2 of 1088,

2. Section 2 af the Code af Intellectual Property Act, Amendment No, 62 af 1979 (hereinafter referred to as the “principal Jor Act enactment”) is hereby amended by the repeal of subsection No, 52 of (8) of that section and the substitution therefor of the following subsection :—
(@) subject to the directions of the Minister, be vested with the general control and superin-

»  tendenee af the registration of industrial designs, patents and marka under the provi- sions of this Code and of alt persans appointed for or engaged in the carrying out of the provisions of this Code; and

(b) take all necessary steps to promote and ‘encourage a national awareness af the subject of copyright by the organization of exhibi- tions, contests, seminars and publlestions and by the setting up of societies for the protec- tion af copyright”,
